DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy web-based tailor intervention support person live HIV ( PLHIV ) manage demand inherent health condition , particularly regard adoption health behaviour physically active , follow healthy diet quit smoking . This randomize controlled trial currently conduct entirely online www.lhivehealthy.ca
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Web-based Interventions Support People Living With HIV Adoption Health Behaviors
DOC.detailed_description: This online randomize controlled trial parallel-groups conduct across Canada . Interested participant invite visit study 's Website www.lhivehealthy.ca The study 's Website contain video clip explain study . After accept condition consent , participant enroll study provide email address pseudonym . Each participant validate email address check . After enrolment , participant receive hyperlink via email invite complete baseline questionnaire . After complete baseline questionnaire , participant randomly assign computer system either experimental group ( TAVIE en sant√© ) control group ( list 5 website ) . Three six month baseline questionnaire , participant complete online questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: live HIV able read understand French English access Internet
